column1: Local Foods////I have also had the duck confit sandwich
column2: the crunchy chicken sandwich (which was good
column4: it's cold sliced chicken which I wasn't expecting)
column6: and various others that were on the menu at various times. I have had most of the sides
column7: but they are hit and miss for me. I don't love the flavors of them all
column8: but I will say they are extremely fresh
